# SeaSide Live Bake Studio - Robots.txt
# Production configuration for search engine crawlers

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Disallow admin and private areas
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /health.html
Disallow: /sw.js

# Allow important pages
Allow: /menu
Allow: /about
Allow: /gallery
Allow: /contact

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://seasidelbs.com/sitemap.xml

# Crawl delay (optional)
Crawl-delay: 1
